entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: Kreacher is an elf who lives to serve the noble house of Black. He is described as cleaning and serving Master (Sirius).

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is a member of the noble house of Black and is referred to as 'Master' by Kreacher. He is described as having a mother who kept herself alive out of pure spite.

entities.name: black
entities.description: The Black family is a noble house that Kreacher serves.

relationships.description: Kreacher serves Sirius, who is referred to as 'Master' by Kreacher.
Sirius belongs to the noble house of Black.
